articles.title: Larry Rudolph, wealthy dentist convicted of killing wife on African safari, sentenced to life in prison - CBS News
articles.description: Larry Rudolph has claimed throughout the case that his wife's death in Zambia in 2016 was an accident.
articles.content: A wealthy dentist convicted of killing his wife at the end of an African safari in Zambia was sentenced to life in prison Monday and faces more than $15 million in penalties for a murder prosecutors … [+6411 chars]

articles.title: Brics group looks to expand at summit despite divisions among key members - The Guardian
articles.description: Experts say India concerned about expansion and any overt anti-west turn as leaders fly into South Africa
